snippet: WIESEL--Professor Elie. Fifth Avenue Synagogue mourns the loss of its esteemed Honorary Trustee, Nobel Laureate, and global humanitarian Professor Elie Wiesel. He was a luminary, an educator, an inspiration, and above all else, a tzadik. It was a ...
lead_paragraph: WIESEL--Professor Elie. Fifth Avenue Synagogue mourns the loss of its esteemed Honorary Trustee, Nobel Laureate, and global humanitarian Professor Elie Wiesel. He was a luminary, an educator, an inspiration, and above all else, a tzadik. It was a sincere privilege to have him daven in our pews and we will miss him greatly. His spirit continues to inspire our congregation. We extend our heartfelt condolences to Marion, Elisha, and the entire Wiesel family. Rabbi Eli Babich, Associate Rabbi Walter J. Molofsky, M.D., Chairman Jacob D. Gold, President 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WIESEL, PROFESSOR ELIE
